events.message: I just received my order, but unfortunately the laptop screen has a large scratch on it and it doesn't look brand new.
The system has identified this case as related to a product defect due to the report of a scratched screen.
An agent from the product support team has been assigned to assist with the scratched laptop screen issue.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the condition of your laptop. I’m here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and confirm whether you have the original packaging?
I’ve attached photos showing the scratch clearly. I still have the box, but it was opened when I got it.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer to have the laptop replaced as soon as possible to avoid more downtime.
We have processed your replacement request and your new laptop will be shipped within two business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement laptop and that it arrived in perfect condition.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it’s in perfect condition. Thanks for the quick help.
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing this case now, and feel free to reach out anytime.
Please take a moment to complete this quick survey regarding your support experience.
